locations: Williamsburg Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA::(300 South 3rd St)
imdb.plot outline: This documentary asks Bodega owners, their staff, and their suppliers what their dreams are and what version of the American Dream they are looking to fulfill. During the pursuit of answering these questions, we are seeking to understand the relationship between the people behind counter, and the people that they are serving non-stop - the ever-growing "hipster" population. In order to properly research this question we need to get both sides.

plot: This documentary asks Bodega owners, their staff, and their suppliers what their dreams are and what version of the American Dream they are looking to fulfill. During the pursuit of answering these questions, we are seeking to understand the relationship between the people behind counter, and the people that they are serving non-stop - the ever-growing "hipster" population. In order to properly research this question we need to get both sides.::David Leigh Abts

This documentary asks Bodega owners, their staff, and their suppliers what their dreams are and what version of the American Dream they are looking to fulfill. During the pursuit of answering these questions, we are seeking to understand the relationship between the people behind counter, and the people that they are serving non-stop - the ever-growing "hipster" population.::David Leigh Abts
